title: Planeslayer Flail
content:
Planeslayer Flail Rare 3~10 Damage 1d8 +2 Bludgeoning Outer-Entity Slayer: When wielded against Fey, fiends, or undead foes, this weapon has a +1d4 bonus to Damage and Attack Rolls. Weapon Enchantment +2 Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal 1 Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Passed from hand to hand by those who hunt creatures from beyond the Material Plane, this flail has two words scrawled on it: 'No Tresspassing.' Flail 0.9 310
